title: All buildings shall be of pucca construction and no easily combustible materials shall be used in their construction
clause_text: All buildings shall be of pucca construction and no easily combustible materials shall be used in their construction.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -
